Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailswas standing in garden as I looked up their was a object circling the sky I carried on looking it was go higher then drop at speed before setting of in one direction then turn suddenly n come back it ad a strong centre beam which was a white glow it would change into a red flashing beam whenn a aeroplane came close it was disappear out of sight when the plane was out of sight it would appear showing a red n blue light at each end of the object before the white beam came back on it hovered in a circle for almost a hour before it came to a halt before took of into the clouds then disapeared out of sight
Summary: ufo took shape from long to short red beam flashing
